table.name: [dbo].[PhotoObj]
table.summary: The main PhotoObj table for the NVSS catalog
table.remarks: The main PhotoObj table for the NVSS catalog
table.column: unique object identifier
J2000 right ascension
Estimate of J2000 right ascension standard deviation
J2000 declination
Estimate of J2000 declination standard deviation
Strength of the source
Standard deviation estimate of the flux
Major axis size of the source
Estimated standard deviation of the major axis size (nulls allowed)
Minor axis size of the source
Estimated standard deviation of the minor axis size (nulls allowed)
Orientation of the major axis on the sky (from N through E) (nulls allowed)
Standard deviation estimate of Pa
Code indicating structure more complex than can be fitted by the Gaussian model(P=peak, R=RMS, S=integrated) (nulls allowed)
offending value (nulls allowed)
Integrated linearly polarized flux density (nulls allowed)
Standard deviation estimate of the integrated linearly polarized flux density (nulls allowed)
Position angle of the "E" vectors on the sky if the source was detected in linear polarization (nulls allowed)
Standard deviation estimate of p_ang (nulls allowed)
Name of the original survey image field
X(Ra) pixel numbers of the center of the component
Y(Dec) pixel numbers of the center of the component
htmid for spatial searches
cartesian x coordinate
cartesian x coordinate
cartesian x coordinate
